clauses.title: Service can block or censor user communications
clauses.description: The service reserves the right, for any or no reason, to refuse to post or reject user communications.
clauses.clause_text: The service normally allows the user to increase the visibility of its profile in various way, but the organization reserves the right to disable the user's access to those features.

case.text: User-generated content can be blocked or censored for any reason

clauses.title: This service throttles your use
clauses.description: The service may impose limits or restrictions to the use of the service, thus negatively impacting users experience. They may do so without reason or prior notice.
clauses.clause_text: In particular, the organization may impose a delay to deter and protect itself from fraud.

case.text: Your use is throttled

clauses.title: This service does not track you
clauses.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".
clauses.clause_text: we do not attempt to track people who visit our website,

case.text: You are not being tracked

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
clauses.clause_text: we strive to collect only the personal information we actually need

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or needs to transfer personal data after a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale of the services, the data will still be processed in a manner that honours the promises made in the agreements.
clauses.clause_text:
On 2024-07-18 11:50:01 UTC, sam.kim168960 (37321)  wrote:
          Legend Financial management, and strategic business development, leveraging advanced technology for accuracy and efficiency.

case.text: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition

clauses.title: This service does not sell your personal data
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: full paragraph: "We do our best to protect everyone's privacy: we do not attempt to track people who visit our website, we strive to collect only the personal information we actually need, and we don't sell it to anyone." The last partial clause has been taken to support this point.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: The user can quit the service by closing their account.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: The user is informed about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text:
All network connections are encrypted, except for some communications between machines located in the same datacenter.

As a precaution against identity theft in case of data leak, the identity information of Liberapay account owners is stored encrypted in our database.

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
clauses.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.
clauses.clause_text:
The organization does not implicitly commit to
anything, in particular it does not guarantee that the service will be
operational at all times without interruptions

case.text: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

clauses.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
clauses.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.
clauses.clause_text:
The organization does not guarantee that the user will be able to withdraw the
money in its account without delay.

case.text: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

clauses.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
clauses.clause_text:
The organization may close the user's account if it considers that they have
violated this contract, or a contract with a partner of the organization, or any
applicable law.

case.text: Your account can be suspended for several reasons

clauses.title: The service refers users to external documents for more information
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its privacy policy does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their own privacy policies.
clauses.clause_text: Please read these documents if you want more information: Stripe's privacy policy and PayPal's privacy policy.

case.text: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

clauses.title: This service requires first-party cookies
clauses.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.
clauses.clause_text:
The user acknowledges that cookies are necessary for the service to function and
agrees to their use.

case.text: First-party cookies are used

clauses.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
clauses.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.
clauses.clause_text: If a part of this contract is nullified, that judgment does not nullify the rest of the agreement.

case.text: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

clauses.title: The service refers users to external documents for more information
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its privacy policy does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their own privacy policies.
clauses.clause_text:
Visitors of the liberapay.com website can also receive cookies sent by Cloudflare. Please read “Understanding the Cloudflare Cookies” if you want to learn more about them.

On some payment pages, extra cookies may be set by the payment processor. Please read these documents if you want more information: Stripe's cookie policy and PayPal's cookie policy.

case.text: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

clauses.title: Users are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.
clauses.description: You must provide your legal name and pseudonyms aren't allowed, but it makes sense for the purposes of this service.
clauses.clause_text: The user commits to use the service in good faith, in particular the user commits not to lie about their identity and not to fill their profile in a deceptive way for the purpose of attracting more donations.

case.text: You are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text:
The organization cannot be held responsible for the consequences of negligence
by the user, notably of failure by the user to secure their password.

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
clauses.description: The Terms may be updated without prior notice, but users will be notified of the changes at the moment they will start applying.
clauses.clause_text:
The organization may modify this contract at any time.
It undertakes to inform
the user of any changes.

case.text: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").
clauses.clause_text: This contract is subject to French law. Any dispute shall be submitted to the competent French jurisdiction.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
